about_the_game:
Gormadae is a cooperative role-playing board game in which players take turns spinning a spinner and moving their characters to various destinations to save their town from a monster invasion. Along the way, players will encounter challenges and obstacles that they must overcome by working together. Will you be able to rally your fellow heroes and save the day?

Character customization

Customize your hero! Choose your character's eye color, shirt, and hair style for a unique look that's all your own.

Rock Paper Scissors Combat With Action Points System

Engage in strategic Rock Paper Scissors combat and earn Action Points by guessing your opponent's move correctly! Use these points to activate powerful abilities and gain an edge in battle.

Field Item & Magic

Collect items and magic scrolls to overcome challenges and achieve your objectives! Use your resources strategically to succeed in your journey.

Field Event

Explore the world and uncover its many special events! From finding treasure to meeting mysterious travelers, these exciting surprises await at every turn.

Save the towns

Name your own town after saving it from monster invasion and start earning a weekly tax! Become the hero your town needs in Gormadae!
